titleHead: Dates cannot attend hearing - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Enter the dates when you can't go to a hearing
titleEdit: Enter a date you can't go to a hearing
itsImportant: It’s important that you make yourself available for a hearing. If you postpone or don’t show up, your appeal could go ahead in your absence or be delayed by several months.
yourHearing: Your hearing will take some time to book so only enter dates between 4 and 22 weeks in the future. Don’t include weekends or bank holidays.

error.allRequired: Enter the date you can't attend
error.dayRequired: Enter the day from the date you can't attend
error.monthRequired: Enter the month from the date you can't attend
error.yearRequired: Enter the year from the date you can't attend
error.underFourWeeks: Only enter dates at least 4 weeks in the future
error.overTwentyTwoWeeks: Only enter dates up to 22 weeks in the future
error.weekend: Enter a date that is not a weekend
error.bankHoliday: Enter a date this is not a bank holiday
